name: Save the Land
description:
Estimated game time: 1-5 minutes.

The land shifts as you stand still, this includes while you're setting up precious lights that slowly dim out. The goal is to join the land to your light so that there are enough of each of the 4 kinds of tiles onscreen to beat each level.

Controls:
WASD for movement:  

Spacebar for setting up a light

Level 1: Introduction, you need to save at least one of each tile 

Level 2: Save a decent chunk of tiles, but you're both faster and can set up lights faster than before

Level 3: The big challenge, depending on your luck this might take a bit of effort as the land is constantly changing and the game is at its most extreme.

This is my entry for the 48 hour, June 2021 GMTK Jam, which had the theme: "Joined Together".

All art and music was made by me, all code was written by me, written in Processing without a game engine (approx 700 lines of code).
